info.name: Gmail Dark Blue
info.description:
Simple dark blue theme (fixed)

NOTE: make sure you use default google theme in gmail settings.  Otherwise some icons may not align properly.

UPDATE: Next on the to-do list is to theme attachment elements when composing emails (ie. send money, emoticons, insert link, insert files using Google Drive, etc.)
info.additionalInfo:
2018/05/26:
- finally fixed those darn icons, and a few other misc things that seem to break over time ... tried a different approach for some of those
2017/05/02:
- converted all colors to variables
- fixed a few things that had broke over time
- this will be the template for Gmail Dark #1 soon (with grey as the base instead of blue)
2017/01/20:
- fixed several icons
- fixed emoji selection background in compose editor
- fixed menu arrows
- added svg namespace to allow modification of svg fill colors
2016/09/06:
- found more image sets to theme (Hangouts functions - call/search friend)
- found some un-themed elements and themed them: action notifications (ie. delete, update, etc), compose TO field contact suggestions popup
- email content when replying isn't always colored as theme colors, tried to fix this (let me know if you find some hard-to-forgive bright colors when replying to emails)
- several misc unthemed elements now themed (had to use classes, might not stick since many classes are dynamically generated on Google CSS)
2016/08/14:
- added / replaced several image sets in blue theme
- fixed some image references to an incorrect image set
- colored some missed bits in COMPOSE window
- fixed some excessive border coloring in COMPOSE window
- found some missed elements in HANGOUTS window
- fixed several missed elements in Gmail Settings
2016/08/09:
- fixed more img elements using the wrong set of images
- colored some more img sets to make the theme more complete
2016/08/04:
- fixed translate bar theme (present in emails not in native language)
- fixed "Follow" popup dialog white BG and borders/separators
- fixed main UI icons
- fixed dark-colored links in sender drop-down (ie "unsubscribe")
- fixed some un-themed elements in Gmail settings page
2016/03/08:
- reborn! finally fixed this theme and it's working much better than ever
2016/01/04:
- managed to find a way to make MOST emails match this theme (except for non-transparent images)
- updated some UI elements that were missing/not themed
